Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Represents a unique contact identified by their WhatsApp number.

lastMessageAt.description: Timestamp of the last message received from this contact.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a conversation.

sentAt.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.

from.description: Indicates if the message was from the user or the AI assistant.

/contacts/{contactId}.description: Stores unique contacts who have interacted with the assistant.

/contacts/{contactId}/messages/{messageI.description: Stores all messages for a specific contact.
